CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultRandomEventsCompanionsFemale69}{COMPANION_NAME_1} approaches you at dawn, suggesting a joint training session. She believes practicing together will improve both your combat techniques and help build trust between you.

CEEvent.Name: CE_random_event_companions_female_stars_m
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultRandomEventsCompanionsFemale72}On a clear night, {COMPANION_NAME_1} invites you to join him away from the campfire. He points out constellations and shares stories from his homeland about the stars. The peaceful moment is a welcome respite from constant warfare.

CEEvent.Name: CE_random_event_companions_female_market_f

CEEvent.Name: CE_random_event_companions_female_stories_m
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultRandomEventsCompanionsFemale80}Around the evening campfire, {COMPANION_NAME_1} begins telling tales of his past adventures. The stories are entertaining and boost morale among the troops. He asks if you have any stories to share.
